! Generated by Dot1Xer Supreme Enterprise Edition
! Vendor: Allied
! Platform: Basic
! Version: {{platform-version}}

! This is a placeholder configuration template for Allied
! In a real implementation, this would include vendor-specific commands

! Basic RADIUS Server Configuration
radius-server host {{radiusServer1}} key {{radiusKey1}}
{{#radiusServer2}}
radius-server host {{radiusServer2}} key {{radiusKey2}}
{{/radiusServer2}}

! Basic 802.1X Configuration
dot1x system-auth-control
authentication default dot1x

! Basic interface configuration
interface {{interface}}
  dot1x port-control auto
  dot1x host-mode {{hostMode}}

! End of template
